About This Page

The "Replying to Message" page displays a form for replying to a private message. It uses the Friends:Message_Form function, but is modified slightly to switch to Reply Mode, which retrieves information about the original private message.

It makes use of the following functions:

  • Friends:Message_Form with reply_mode="y" parameter to switch the message form into reply mode and display a pre-filled form for the currently logged in user to reply to a message their friend sent them.
